channel.title: [PI] [Spawn & Pk] Eternity-Zone [All Positions=[OPEN] [PI]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tQVtg.png[/img][/center] [b][i][size=24pt][color=black][center]-Why should i apply for Eternity-Zone?-[/center] [i][b][center][size=8pt]I Believe as being the owner of Eternity-Zone, we are going to put are utmost in to this server, all the way from the players to mods, admins, devlopers,vets, that this server will be on the top very soon. But we all know that takes time, money, effort, dedication. This is exactally why i am being VERY VERY picky about who is in my development/staff team. In conclusion, hopefully you will be a good support, thanks![/size][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lqaLm.png[/img][/center] [center][size=10pt][font=andale mono] Want to join us? Please sign up, we would appreciate all the support! [color=purple]Server Sided Programmer [0/3] Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: Client Sided Coder [0/3] Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: GFX Artist [0/3] Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: Webmaster [0/3] Name: Age: *Years Of Experience: *Previous Work: Strengths: Weaknesses: Contact Information: How Active Will you be: Moderator/Administrator [0/6] NEED OTHER POSITIONS FILLED BEFORE I RECUIT MODS AND ADMINS Name: Age: Why should I consider you (minimum 250 words): How active are you: Timezone: [/font][/size][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lqaLm.png [/center][/img] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/25iQd.png[/img][/center] Main owners: [color=green]1[/color]/[color=green]1[/color] [color=black]-Eternity[/color] Co-owners: [color=red]0[/color]/[color=green]2[/color] - -[this spot is for the Hoster] Admins [color=red]0[/color]/[color=green]3[/color] - - - Mods [color=red]0[/color]/[color=green]5[/color] - - - - - [size=14pt][font=courier]TorvaPkz v2 Source for Base![/font][/size] [i][size=36pt]Pictures:[/size] [/i] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2d12sxt.jpg[/img] [img]http://i53.tinypic.com/2d11en8.jpg[/img] [img]http://i56.tinypic.com/2d12sxt.jpg[/img] [img]http://[center]http://i.imgur.com/lqaLm.png[/center][/img] [left][u][size=24pt]Update Log:[/size][/u][/left]

item.title: [PI] [Spawn & Pk] Eternity-Zone [All Positions=[OPEN] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sunder Sunder
item.description:
@Sunder wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:10, topic:433272”][quote author=Sunder link=topic=535990.msg3923448#msg3923448 date=1329953463]
Name: Robert
Age: 18
*Years Of Experience: 5 years hobbyist programming.
*Previous Work: I have personal projects, nothing public.
Strengths: Strong knowledge and experience with C++, C#, and some web dev. I’ve played runescape since 2002, so I know a lot about the game. I’ve been an admin on a server before, and I’ve hosted my own for fun with friends. Experienced with networking concepts, terminology, and practice.
Weaknesses: New to Java.
Contact Information: PM me for contact info, I don’t want my shit spammed into tomorrow.
How Active Will you be: Active almost every day, can be on as long as I need/want.

Why I think I should be chosen for staff:
I’m experienced in some key areas. I work great with people. I have a lot of spare time that I could dedicate to this, however if you need a coder I’d rather be the tools and utilities programmer than anything so that I could stick with C# and C++ because those are the languages I’ll be using in class this fall so I’d really like to keep building on the knowledge I already have. I have played runescape for a decade, on and off in the last three or so years though. I think I’d make a good admin and a good addition to the team because I have time to contribute, knowledge and skills to apply during said time, and a background in Runescape, private servers, and gaming in general. I’m going to school for computer science and video game design/development this September, so later on I may not be as active, but for a few months I should be extremely active. Just PM me if you’d like. I’m sort of a jack of all trades when it comes to software development, but the area I’m best in is C#/.NET. I’d love to join if you’ll have me.
[/quote]

199 words lol.[/quote]

I think what matters is that I was honest and not bullshitting like some other applications I’ve seen. “I’m 14 and I’m a professional java coder” <- Just be thankful I wasn’t one of those, eh?

Read full topic

Weaknesses: New to Java.
Contact Information: PM me for contact info, I don’t want my shit spammed into tomorrow.
How Active Will you be: Active almost every day, can be on as long as I need/want.

Why I think I should be chosen for staff:
I’m experienced in some key areas. I work great with people. I have a lot of spare time that I could dedicate to this, however if you need a coder I’d rather be the tools and utilities programmer than anything so that I could stick with C# and C++ because those are the languages I’ll be using in class this fall so I’d really like to keep building on the knowledge I already have. I have played runescape for a decade, on and off in the last three or so years though. I think I’d make a good admin and a good addition to the team because I have time to contribute, knowledge and skills to apply during said time, and a background in Runescape, private servers, and gaming in general. I’m going to school for computer science and video game design/development this September, so later on I may not be as active, but for a few months I should be extremely active. Just PM me if you’d like. I’m sort of a jack of all trades when it comes to software development, but the area I’m best in is C#/.NET. I’d love to join if you’ll have me. :D[/quote]

item.title: [PI] [Spawn & Pk] Eternity-Zone [All Positions=[OPEN] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sunder Sunder
item.description:
@Sunder wrote:

Name: Robert
Age: 18
*Years Of Experience: 5 years hobbyist programming.
*Previous Work: I have personal projects, nothing public.
Strengths: Strong knowledge and experience with C++, C#, and some web dev. I’ve played runescape since 2002, so I know a lot about the game. I’ve been an admin on a server before, and I’ve hosted my own for fun with friends. Experienced with networking concepts, terminology, and practice.
Weaknesses: New to Java.
Contact Information: PM me for contact info, I don’t want my shit spammed into tomorrow.
How Active Will you be: Active almost every day, can be on as long as I need/want.

Why I think I should be chosen for staff:
I’m experienced in some key areas. I work great with people. I have a lot of spare time that I could dedicate to this, however if you need a coder I’d rather be the tools and utilities programmer than anything so that I could stick with C# and C++ because those are the languages I’ll be using in class this fall so I’d really like to keep building on the knowledge I already have. I have played runescape for a decade, on and off in the last three or so years though. I think I’d make a good admin and a good addition to the team because I have time to contribute, knowledge and skills to apply during said time, and a background in Runescape, private servers, and gaming in general. I’m going to school for computer science and video game design/development this September, so later on I may not be as active, but for a few months I should be extremely active. Just PM me if you’d like. I’m sort of a jack of all trades when it comes to software development, but the area I’m best in is C#/.NET. I’d love to join if you’ll have me.

Read full topic
